channel.title: Health Analytics on Analytics by Vignesh
channel.description: Recent content in Health Analytics on Analytics by Vignesh

item.title: Building a Bodyweight Tracker
item.description: Steps Create a google sheet Name sheet “Bodyweight Tracker” Create Shiny App Shiny App Code Load the necessary R Packages: # Define list of required packages packages<-c("shiny", "googlesheets","DT","ggplot2","ggplot2", "dplyr") #logical vector that lists which packages are already installed packages_checked<-(packages %in% installed.packages()[,1]) #list of packages that are not installed packages_required <- packages[!packages_checked] #install packages that are required if (sum(!(packages_checked))>0) { install.packages(packages_required) } #load packages "getSymbols.warning4.0"=FALSE lapply(packages, require, character.
